trans-unit.source: Provides enumerated values that are used to set revalidation-specific <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control" name="Cache-Control" href=""></xref> HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于设置重新验证特定的枚举的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control" name="Cache-Control" href=""> </xref> HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: The HttpCacheRevalidation enumeration is used to set revalidation-specific HTTP headers, and is set using the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: HttpCacheRevalidation 枚举可用于设置重新验证特定 HTTP 标头，并使用设置<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation%2A> method is not called, no `Cache-Control` HTTP header is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation%2A>不调用方法，不`Cache-Control`设置 HTTP 标头。</xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.SetRevalidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the HTTP header to <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control: must-revalidate" name="Cache-Control: must-revalidate" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP 标头设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control: must-revalidate" name="Cache-Control: must-revalidate" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If this value is set, no cache-revalidation directive is sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值设置，发送没有缓存重新验证指令。

trans-unit.source: Sets the HTTP header to <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control: proxy-revalidate" name="Cache-Control: proxy-revalidate" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTTP 标头设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cache-Control: proxy-revalidate" name="Cache-Control: proxy-revalidate" href=""> </xref>。
